name: Mars Pit
description:
Space WHY Corporation was preparing Mars Surface but something unexpected happened. 

ALIEN INVASION.

Then as your only choice you use you mission truck and smash the aliens.

Score based on how many domes (bases) keep standing.

When All domes down game ends. Player is invincible.

Play with Array keys and look around with mouse.

This is the first game I submit a gamejam, sponsor of jam was lootlocker I implemented their system but couldn't finish leaderboard. Also there's implementation for level variations and powerups but timeline.. That was fun and will be developed.
